Summary: Toolbar missing if layout is reset
Description:
Test steps:
 # Open existing project or create new one
 # Reset layout settings by clicking View -> Reset layout
 # After restart toolbar is not visible (see picture)
 # Cannot drag guides from top or from bottom (dragging from sides works)
 # Drag editor window a bit by clicking it at the up most panel
 # Toolbar is visible again and dragging guides works
Creator: Tanja Remes
